amendatorysection.catchline: Ethanol facility eligible for tax credits or incentives; employ residents.
amendatorysection.para: Any ethanol facility eligible for tax credits or incentives under the Ethanol Development Act, the Employment and Investment Growth Act, or the Nebraska Advantage Rural Development Act shall whenever possible employ workers who are residents of the State of Nebraska.

crossreference.para: Employment and Investment Growth Act, see section 77-4101.
Nebraska Advantage Rural Development Act, see section 77-27,187.
